records.name: Mercure Maldives Kooddoo - Adults - Only Escape - 50 Percent Off Transfers

descriptions.direction: Located in Kooddoo, Mercure Maldives Kooddoo Adult-Only Resort is near the airport and on a private beach. Kooddoo Harbor and Kodahuttaa Island are two other places to visit that come recommended. Take an opportunity to explore the area for water adventures such as windsurfing.
descriptions.general: Mercure Maldives Kooddoo is an adult-only resort with 69 villas available in 6 different categories. Rooted in a locality serving authentic Maldivian and international flavours, Mercure Maldives offers a generous all-inclusive concept, bed and breakfast, and a half-board stay option allowing you to explore the island at your own pace.

records.short_description: Excellent club hotel. Great rooms in excellent location. Awesome vibe.
